segments.text: Look ! This picture of Mom in her cap and gown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't it lovely ! That's when she got her Master's Degree from Miami University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we are very proud of her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's a nice one of all of you together . Do you have the negative ? May I have a copy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Surely , I'll have one made for you . You want a print ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I'd like a slide , I have a new projector .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to see that myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a wallet size print made for me , too .
segments.speaker: S2
